title: A few more champs  should be added to the Blood Moon mode.
body: I would love to see Jhin, Azir, TF, Ezreal, Fiora, Jayce, maybe master Yi, definitely Nidalee, Nocturn, Quinn, Graves.

replies.body: Nocturne would just dominate, Quinn I could see, the rest no.  Yi would get rekt  by night of edge. His alpha strike is his only non auto attack skill that he can damage with.

> [{quoted}](name=Teémò,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JEBBVPAK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-18T14:54:11.178+0000)
>
> Nocturne would just dominate, Quinn I could see, the rest no.  Yi would get rekt  by night of edge. His alpha strike is his only non auto attack skill that he can damage with.

Why don't you agree with the rest?
they all have either too much sustain and way less burst, or can get tanky even with only damage items. and as for nidalee, her heal is way too good in a game mode about killing the fastest
